name: Astro Escape
description:
This is my 2D 3D Platform Project.

Modifications

1) Created 3 original levels with secret paths and multiple ways  to complete each level

2) Added new enemies, as well as changing their color and attk/def 

3) Changed the size of enemies, as well as their health and damage

4) Made some speed modifications to the enemies and ramps 

5) Added Instructions

Credits

Created by Jose Cruz
